lines.text: I'm Greta. I live for Lucy... I mean, I live here, with Lucy.
What's wrong?

[crying]
I think I'm kind of in love with you.
They wanted me to examine my life. I mean, this is it. It's about you right now. I'm thinking about you.
What's going on? Where's Lucy?
Uh... she died this morning.
That is... a really fucked up thing to say to me. Now... I don't know what Greta told you or anyone else, but you don't know shit about me and Lucy!
It doesn't fucking matter now! It doesn't matter.
I haven't been deconstructed in a long time.
Yeah, I bet you hate that.
I don't hate it at all.
I don't know. Maybe I will just go to China. I like China. We had fabulous... Opium there.
You need some *help*, G.
Look at yourself, Lucy.
What did you do to yourself? C'mon, tell me! What kind of problem?
I don't know. It's not really a problem. It's more of an issue.
You just said a problem. Is it a problem? Now it's an issue. Is it a problem or an issue?
Both. I have a love issue, and a drug problem. Or maybe I have a love problem, and a drug issue. I don't know.
It's like cultural studies or semiotics. Philosophy, you know? Foucault, Derrida, Kristeva, whatevah.
[Her come-on line to Syd]
I want to get high with you.
This is intense...
Is it?
I'm not usually like this
Like what?
Nervous.
Can I take pictures of you?
Right now? No... I feel like shit right now, I'm kinda wrecked.
You look really sexy, actually.
I did a line of heroin. I don't think I'm used to it...
[to Lucy about being shown]
That's great, Luce! You've got yourself a cover. Good for fucking you!
I'm kinda hot. That's kinda serious.
Is it the German?
I'll wait for you, ladies. Enjoy your fight. I'll be right here when you're done.
Where do you think I've been all week?
With the teenager.
Hi. Are you running a bath?

[puzzled pause]
No. Are you?
